import React, { useState } from 'react' import Types from './Types' import {orderByName} from '../actions/index' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const Filtros = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch const [orden, setOrden] = useState('') function handleSort(e){ e.preventDefault() dispatch(orderByName(e.target.value)) setCurrentPage(1) setOrden(`Ordenado ${e.target.value}`) } return (
) } export default Filtros
